Key Match Events: Ioannou scored in the 78th minute to seal a 1-0 win for Cyprus over Lithuania
Pittas scored in the 22nd minute to give Cyprus the lead
Pre-Game Insights: Cyprus and Lithuania meet in Limassol for a friendly on Sunday after both sides completed their Euro 2024 qualifying campaigns
Neither side were close to threatening the top two positions in their respective groups, and disappointing Nations League campaigns last year mean neither can fall back on a playoff spot
Lithuania picked up some good results in qualifying, but the majority came at home, and they have been notoriously poor travellers of late
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cyprus are the first side to be confirmed to finish on zero points in their Euro 2024 qualifying campaign
Lithuania will face Belarus in March to avoid relegation to League D
Others: Cyprus possible starting lineup: Mall; Andreou, Pileas, Gogic, Laifis, Anderson Correia; Kyriakou, Kyprianou, Charalampous; Kastanos, Pittas
Lithuania possible starting lineup: Gertmonas; Lasickas, Girdvainis, Lekiatas, Sirvys; Utkus, Vorobjovas, Gineitis; Slivka, Paulaskas, Cernych
